segments.text: Hey , look ! They ’ re playing reruns of the 1996 Olympics .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Isn ’ t that Michael Johnson ? I think he set a world record in this race .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He completed the first 200 / 400 double in Olympic history !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure ? What about Carl Lewis ? He won four golds , didn ’ t he ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Carl won the gold in the 100 , 200 , long jump , and 4x100 relay in 1984 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like the way Carl runs . He looks more graceful .
segments.speaker: S2
